title: Subscriber growth trend
description: Design a line graph to track the monthly growth rate of new subscribers to an online service, using 'blue' to represent the trend.
solution:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

df['month'] = pd.to_datetime(df['month'])
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
plt.plot(df['month'], df['growth_rate'], color='blue', linewidth=2, marker='o')

plt.title('Monthly Growth Rate of New Subscribers')
plt.xlabel('Month')
plt.ylabel('Growth Rate (%)')
plt.grid(True)
plt.xticks(rotation=45)
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
